titleStmt.title: A discourse of proper sacrifice, in way of answer to A.B.C. Jesuite, another anonymus of Rome: whereunto the reason of the now publication, and many observable passages relating to these times are prefixed by way of preface: by Sr. Edvvard Dering Knight and baronet.
titleStmt.author: Dering, Edward, Sir, 1598-1644.
Glover, George, b. ca. 1618.
Jansson van Ceulen, Cornelius, b. 1593.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Francis Eglesfield, and are to be sold at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls-churchyard,

notesStmt.note: A printing of and reply to a previously unpublished work.
Frontispiece port. signed: Cor. Iohnson pinxit. G. Glover sculps.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
